title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 33.10 - Size of containers; labels on containers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 33.10 - Size of containers; labels on containers

State Regulations

All alcoholic beverages purchased or sold by permittees
under this section must be in the original sealed containers and must conform
with the provisions of the law with respect to labels and the size of
containers, except by express permission first obtained by the permittee from
the Liquor Authority in writing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
33.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
